overview:
Ian Saunders is Co-founder & CEO of Crystal Semantics, a leading company in the field of semantic technology. Responsible for the development and strategic direction of the company. Crystal Semantics is the leading provider of semantic advertising technology, Leveraging the Sense Engine, a proprietary non-algorithmic linguistics based technology, to enable the rapid categorization of web content, brand safety and other associated data points. Raised seed and Series A funding rounds and received patents in US & UK. We developed strong team of multilingual editors, technologists and support staff.

Company was acquired by ad pepper media in 2006 and Crystal Semantics technology has been incorporated into Sense Engine based technologies such as iSense (Page level semantic targeting) & SiteScreen (brand protection) & Emediate (ad serving solutions).

Won IAB’s „Digital Innovator of the Year“ Award Econsultancy Innovation Award European Seal of e-Excellence Festival of Media Awards in the category “Communication Futures” Technology is now in active use by partners such as ad serving platforms, demand side platforms, sell side platforms, publisher sales houses, ad networks etc in over 30 countries globally.
